5th Pyongyang International Trade Fair to be held
articles.content:
5th Pyongyang International Trade Fair to be held
    Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The 5th Pyongyang International Trade Fair will be held from May 6 to 9.
 The fair, which will bring together over 160 companies from 15 countries and regions, would be an occasion to boost cooperation and exchange among countries in trade, economic, scientific and technological and other different fields.

articles.content:
General director of OPEC fund here
    Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- General director of the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) fund Y. Seyyid Abdulai and his party arrived here today. They were greeted at the airport by vice-minister of finance Jang Song Il.

articles.title: Vice-premier of cabinet meets OPEC fund general director
articles.content:
Vice-premier of cabinet meets OPEC fund general director
     Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- Jo Chang Dok, vice-premier of the cabinet of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Y. Seyyid Abdulai, general director of the OPEC fund, and his party who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 On hand were officials concerned.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok meets German delegation
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok meets German delegation
    Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the German-Korean parliamentary friendship group led by chairman  Hartmut Koschyk, member of the German bundestag, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 On hand were Ri Jong Hyok, chairman of the Korea-Germany parliamentary friendship group, other officials concerned and the German ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Treaty and agreements between DPRK and Vietnam inked
articles.content:
Treaty and agreements between DPRK and Vietnam inked
     Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- A treaty on legal cooperation in civil and criminal cases between the DPRK and Vietnam, an agreement on the prevention of double taxation and evasion of taxes on income, an agreement on marine transportation, an agreement on the encouragement and protection of investment and an agreement on trade between the governments of the DPRK and Vietnam and an agreement on barter trade between the ministries of foreign trade of the DPRK and Vietnam were signed here today.
 Present at the signing ceremony on the DPRK side were Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, and officials concerned and on the Vietnam side were Tran Duc Luong, President of Vietnam, and his party.    
 The treaty and agreements were inked by Kim Pyong Ryul, chief justice of the DPRK central court, Jang Song Il, vice-minister of finance, Ra Tong Hui, chief of staff of the Ministry of Land and Marine Transport, and Kim Jong Gi, vice-minister of foreign trade, authorized by the DPRK government and by Nguyen Dinh Loc, minister of justice, Lai Quang Thuc, vice-minister of planning and investment, Phan The Minh, vice-minister of transport, and Phan The Rue, vice-minister of commerce, authorized by the government of Vietnam.

Vietnamese President meets DPRK spa chairman
articles.content:
Vietnamese President meets DPRK SPA chairman 
     Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- Vietnamese President Tran Duc Luong met chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly Choe Thae Bok at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 Present there were Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of foreign affairs, and other officials concerned.    
 Chief of the presidential office Nguyen Canh Dinh, minister of justice Nguyen Dinh loc, Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK Do Thi Hoa and other suite members were also present there. The president had a talk with the chairman in an atmosphere overflowing with friendship.

articles.title: Talks held between DPRK and Vietnam foreign ministers
articles.content:
Talks held between DPRK and Vietnam foreign ministers
    Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- Talks between DPRK foreign minister Paek Nam Sun and Vietnam foreign minister Nguyen Dy Nien were held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 Present at the talks on the DPRK side were Ri Hong, DPRK ambassador to Vietnam, and officials concerned and on the Vietnam side some members of the president's party.    
 The talks proceeded in a friendly atmosphere.
